title: Bug 114905: Default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: Description: The default value set in the list box of the report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: No default value was set in the list box after modifying the default value. The OK button is still enabled after modifying the default value.
EB: The default value 'aaa' should be retained in the list box after modifying the default value. After step 5, the OK button should be disabled.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new report parameter and set the Display type to List Box.
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc'. Set 'aa' as the default value and click OK.
3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK directly.
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
5.
